abstract: French administrative court cancels the construction permit for the Grand Mosque of Marseille, which is expected to be one of the largest mosques in France, citing questions about whether the project has met urban planning requirements.
snippet: An administrative court canceled the construction permit on Thursday for the Grand Mosque of Marseille, which is expected to be one of the largest mosques in France, French newspapers reported.
lead_paragraph: An administrative court canceled the construction permit on Thursday for the Grand Mosque of Marseille, which is expected to be one of the largest mosques in France, French newspapers reported.

headline.main: France: Court Cancels Permit for Grand Mosque of Marseille
